forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for flooding rains. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for flooding rains. High 58F. SSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
